channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Man Accused in Brutal N.C. Rail Slaying Faces Federal Charge
item.description: A conviction would make the man, who is accused of killing a Ukrainian refugee on a light rail train in Charlotte, eligible for the federal death pena...

item.title: Gesture Politics Won’t Help Palestinians
item.description: But diaspora Jews will pay an ugly price.

item.title: Supreme Court says it will weigh in on Trump's tariffs
item.description: Two lower courts have said some of President Trump's tariffs are unlawful. Now the Supreme Court has agreed to examine the issue.

item.title: Israel Targeted Hamas Leadership in Qatar Strike
item.description: The Gulf nation of Qatar has been trying to negotiate a cease-fire in the conflict. The attack threatened to destabilize those peace efforts.

item.description: The Gulf nation of Qatar has been trying to negotiate a cease-fire in the conflict. The attack threatened to destabilize those peace efforts.

item.title: Live Updates: Nepali Troops Move to Restore Order as Death Toll Rises to 22
item.description: Protesters defied a curfew to set fire to government buildings and the homes of politicians as unrest over censorship and economic issues continued.

item.description: Demonstrators have set fire to government buildings. The military has sent in troops to restore order.
